Punch/Jaws/The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/
Choran:




Punch sat at the bridge of the Alliance base, rather bored and pressing a few 
buttons, scans revealing nothing of danger in the vacinity of Spain or its 
islands.

---

The Oblitercons remained in CR chambers, Dark One, Breakdown, and Pyro being 
the closest to being fully repaired, only a couple dozen cycles left.

---

Entering his quarters, Scattershot took out Serpentor's head from subspace 
and locked it in a clear cabinet so he could admire it.  "I win, serpentine 
fool!  Not Nemesis Enforcer!" he said as he burst out into evil cackling for 
no real reason.

---

Nemesis Enforcer remained in the CR pool, still a little ways to go before 
getting out of the pool.

===

In Brazil, South America, Choran jumped up in excitement.  "The ship!  It 
just passed Pluto!"

"What's that?" 

"Predator, you idiot!  That's the farthest planet from the Sun in this 
pitiful solar system.  That means in only a short eighteen cycles our ship 
will land and carry us back to safety!"

"Excellent!  And with the information we have we will earn enough money to 
return with larger numbers and capture our prey.  Or we will be the heralds 
of a mighty Predacon warlord who wishes to easily squash all the enemy forces 
on this pitiful rock even!"

"The first one is possible, but the second one is a long shot."

"Shut up, Predator!"
